inclusion.criterion: At least one visit in one of the HIV clinics
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with positive HBsAg and/or anti-HBc will be regarded as having HBV co-infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with positive HCV antibody will be regarded as having HCV co-infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Documented diagnosis of hepatitis B or hepatitis C infection, or
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Negative HIV antibody result, or no record of HIV diagnosis or anti-retroviral therapy prescription
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and HBV co-infection, but no evidence of HIV infection or treatment.
